name: Gem Valley Golf
description:
Every shot counts. Beware of spikes. Make your choice, take your time!

SIMPLE RULES
- Tap and swipe to move the ball at any time!
- Balls collect gems.
- Collect all gems to open the hole
- Putt the ball in the hole!
- Don’t hit the spikes.


This game is a new, satisfying zen inspired by classic arcade games!

NO ADS. NO IAP. JUST FUN

Features:
- 150 Levels - More Coming Soon
- One Tap Controls
- Quick but Challenging Levels
- Saucy Visuals
- Unlimited gameplay
- Optimized Battery Consumption
- Flawless Animations
Zen visuals change as you advance

WARNING! Extremely ADDICTING!
